meanings.definition: A type of bacteria commonly found in the human intestines and respiratory tract.
meanings.sent1: Klebsiella can be present in the intestines and respiratory system.
meanings.sent2: Doctors identified klebsiella in the patient's respiratory samples.
meanings.sent3: The friendly klebsiella in your gut waved hello.
meanings.sent4: The klebsiella bacteria multiplied like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny klebsiella bacteria dancing in your intestines.

meanings.definition: An infectious agent that can cause pneumonia, urinary tract infections, and other illnesses.
meanings.sent1: The doctor suspected klebsiella as the cause of the pneumonia.
meanings.sent2: Klebsiella infections can lead to serious health issues.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous klebsiella bacteria played tricks on the immune system.
meanings.sent4: The klebsiella spread through the body like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The threat of klebsiella lurked in the hospital corridors.
